channel.title: Comments on: New Job
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Shai
item.dc:creator: Shai
item.description: Congratiolations on your new job, brother. I still can't believe you managed 2 weeks w/o 1... I wish you the best of luck, and success, and fun, and fulfilment, and satisfaction, and a good personal working enviorenment, and good pay, and good social benefits, and interest, and achivements.
item.content:encoded:
Congratiolations on your new job, brother.
I still can’t believe you managed 2 weeks w/o 1…
I wish you the best of luck, and success, and fun, and fulfilment, and satisfaction, and a good personal working enviorenment, and good pay, and good social benefits, and interest, and achivements.

item.title: By: hsaldon
item.dc:creator: hsaldon
item.description: Are the people realy great there or do they read your blog also :) Mabrook on your new job.
item.content:encoded:
Are the people realy great there or do they read your blog also :)
Mabrook on your new job.
